welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lakewood, where the charm of a small town meets the excitement of the city. Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: The Root Cafe
restaurants.description: The Root Cafe is a café located in Lakewood.
restaurants.address: 15118 Detroit Ave (at Andrews Ave), Lakewood, OH 44107

restaurants.name: Aladdin's Eatery
restaurants.description: Aladdin's Eatery is a middle eastern restaurant located in Lakewood.

restaurants.name: Forage Public House
restaurants.description: Forage Public House is a gastropub located in Lakewood.
restaurants.address: 14600 Detroit Ave (btwn St Charles & Belle), Lakewood, OH 44107

restaurants.name: Barrio
restaurants.description: Barrio is a taco restaurant located in Lakewood.

restaurants.name: Sarita A Restaurant
restaurants.description: Sarita A Restaurant is a new american restaurant located in Lakewood.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport offers luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Erie Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Denver International Airport, housing ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
